user_query: I want to check the leaderboard of the Gulag mode in Warzone for the top 500 players. Also, provide me with the upcoming free games on Epic Games and their descriptions.

TaskList.description: Fetch the leaderboard data for the Gulag mode in Warzone to get the top 500 players.
Retrieve the upcoming free games available on Epic Games along with their descriptions.
Combine the leaderboard data and free games information into a single report.
